history.proof: intros U A B. split. - intros x H. rewrite Union_iff in H. destruct H as [HA | HB]. + qsimpl time: 1 use: Union_introl. exists 0. simpl. apply HA. + qsimpl time: 1 use: Union_intror,Union_introl. exists 1. simpl. apply HB. - intros x H. destruct H as [n Hn]. destruct n. + apply Union_introl. simpl in Hn. apply Hn. + apply Union_intror. simpl in Hn. qsimpl time: 1 use: Union_intror,Union_introl.

exceptions.exn: In environment U : Type A, B : Ensemble U x : U HA : In U A x Unable to unify "Union ?M1987 ?M1988 ?M1989 ?M1990" with "exists i : nat, Binart_set_list U A B i x".
In environment U : Type A, B : Ensemble U x : U HB : In U B x Unable to unify "Union ?M2135 ?M2136 ?M2137 ?M2138" with "exists i : nat, Binart_set_list U A B i x".
In environment U : Type A, B : Ensemble U x : U n : nat Hn : match n with | 0 => B | S _ => Empty_set U end x Unable to unify "match n with | 0 => B | S _ => Empty_set U end x" with "In U B x".

original: intros U A B. split. - intros x H. rewrite Union_iff in H. destruct H as [HA | HB]. + apply Union_introl. exists 0. simpl. apply HA. + apply Union_intror. exists 1. simpl. apply HB. - intros x H. destruct H as [n Hn]. destruct n. + apply Union_introl. simpl in Hn. apply Hn. + apply Union_intror. simpl in Hn. apply Hn.
